111.content:
A night fury, with its shovel like head, ear flaps around the head, a aerodynamic body, 3 sets of wings...
Well now, he didn't expect it to be so cool or such a good choice.
So..
111.title: night fury

1111.content: A angry snort alerts hiccup to the dragon's condition. It was awake and a bit mad, he opened the basket and the dragon spoke...
1111.title: skip to the wake up

choices: skip to her waking up again
11112.content:
'Who are you?' She demanded... or you thought it was a she.
"I am Hiccup." I replied.
'I am hungry, feed me fish.' She demanded again...
I go to the food I gathered for her and grabbed her some and carefully fed her she purred and crawled onto my lap... there she passed out... I sigh... well not time like the pressent to read up on a book of mine...
11112.title: Female

choices: time skip to it waking up
112.content: he could tell from the black skin, small body and legs yet big curved teeth, claws, wings and tail that it was a leachling. leachlings were known for feeding on blood and their wings were strong enough to lift a human into the air so some viking heros would let their leachlings latch onto and feed on their back but hiccup was small and like most vikings even omething as compeling as flight was having a parasite was a little concerning.
112.title: leachlet
